title: Tonde Mon Pe
synopsis: Fifteen-year-old country girl Mon-Mon dreams of being a fashion designer and gets a job as an au pair to a rising star designer, Mrs. Kano, her baby girl PePe, and her silly writer husband.
staff: [['Kodama, Kenji', ['Episode Director']], ['Okuwaki, Masaharu', ['Episode Director']], ['Suda, Yumiko', ['Episode Director']], ['Iuchi, Shuji', ['Episode Director']]]
